Features

Everything You Need to Preserve Your Legacy

Simple tools designed for storytelling, not technology.

Guided Prompts

Daily questions designed to spark meaningful stories and memories you might otherwise forget to share.

Secure Private Storage

Your memories belong to you. Bank-level encryption ensures only your family can access your stories.

Your Family Vault

A beautifully organized archive of voices, videos, and photos—searchable and preserved forever.

Time Capsules

Record messages to be revealed on future birthdays, graduations, or any moment you choose.

Family Sharing

Invite parents, grandparents, and children to contribute and experience your shared family history.

Effortless Recording

Just tap and talk. No complicated setup—capture a memory in under five minutes.

How It Works

Start in Minutes, Not Hours

We've made preserving your legacy as simple as having a conversation.

01

Create Your Account

Sign up in seconds. No credit card required to start preserving your memories.

02

Record Your Stories

Answer guided prompts with voice, video, or photos. Just tap and share what matters.

03

Share With Family

Invite loved ones to view, contribute, and build your family legacy together.
